sentence.Network_en: The Afro-Asian nations had approved the basic general principles of non-alignment.
sentence.Network_cn: 亚非国家已经同意了不结盟的基本通则。

sentence.Network_en: Some Afro-Caribbeans are rejecting the whole race relations industry.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些加勒比黑人在抵制整个种族关系运动。

sentence.Network_en: Afro hair is short and tightly curled.
sentence.Network_cn: 非洲式发型是浓密的小短卷。

means.word_mean: 1. a wig that gives the appearance of an afro hairdo

auth_sentence.content: It had a big green foam skirt and red wig.
auth_sentence.res_content: It had a big green foam skirt and red wig.

auth_sentence.content: The wig shop was shuttered and its owner had fled.

auth_sentence.content: He was dressed as a woman and wearing a wig.
